channel.title: Ashie's Class Suggestion Thread (2 NEW CLASSES ADDED!)
channel.description:
**MORTICIAN (NEUTRAL KILLER):**
**Passive Ability 1:** **Dark Aura:** If you are killed at night, the player who used said ability on you will become a Mortician.
**Passive Ability 2:** **Magical Combo:** You may talk with other Morticians at night freely, however only one Mortician may use an ability at a time. There may be a maximum of 3 Morticians (for balance).
**Day Ability 1**: **Curse**: Cast a magical spell on a non-Mortician player, they will become a Mortician in two nights if they are not healed by a Physician or Alchemist. They will not know they are cursed until they have one night left on their count. See below for immune classes. Uses: 2
**Night Ability 1:** **Spell of Despair:** Attempt to kill target player. Uses: Infinite
**Night Ability 2:** **Bribe:** Attempt to convert target player into a Mortician. Uses: 1
**Immune Classes:** These classes are immune to being a Mortician: Prince King Unseen Cult Possessor Reaper Paladin
**Changelog:** 4/17/17: Mortician is born! 4/17/17: Made some minor tweaks to the immune classes, and the Dark Aura ability based on feedback. 4/20/17: Made some more changes based on feedback, including making Paladin immune and changing the Day Ability name. 4/22/17: Made the entire Mortician thread into a class suggestion thread. 5/25/17: Sorry, took a long break from ToL as a whole. Changed all of my classes to include "Unseen" in their descriptions instead of "Black Rose".
**GUARDIAN (BLUE DRAGON SUPPORT):**
**Passive Ability 1:** **Fearless:** Immune to being occupied at night.
**Day Ability 1:** **Lock Eyes:** Give another player a threatening stare, disabling their Night Ability for the next night. Uses: 2
**Night Ability 1:** **Redirect:** Stand guard at your door, anyone who visits you tonight will instead visit your target player. Uses: 2
**Night Ability 2:** **Guard:** Stand guard at another player's house, if someone attempts to attack, collect the soul of, possess, or occupy your target your presence will scare them off. Uses: Infinite
**Unseen Equivalent:** The Watchdog **Cult Equivalent:** The Ritualist
**Changelog:** 4/22/17: Guardian and Watchdog are born!
**THE WATCHDOG (CONVERTED GUARDIAN, UNSEEN SUPPORT)**
**Passive Ability 1:** **Fearless:** Cannot be occupied at night.
**Passive Ability 2:** **Eagle Eyesight:** On even nights, you will know who visits the Assassin at night. On odd nights, you will know who visits the Mastermind at night.
**Day Ability 1:** **Threaten:** Verbally threaten a player, they will use their Night Ability on a player of your choice. Uses: 2
**Night Ability 1:** **Guard Dog:** Summon a guard dog to prevent the death of the Assassin tonight. If anyone visits the Assassin, the guard dog will scare them away. Uses: 1
**Changelog:** 4/22/17: Guardian and Watchdog are born! 5/25/17: Sorry, took a long break from ToL as a whole. Changed all of my classes to include "Unseen" in their descriptions instead of "Black Rose". Made changes to Watchdog.
More classes coming soon :slight_smile:
